description:
am currently married, albeit unhappily, and am looking for someone to share friendship and laughs with.

I am a quiet, introverted man who does not enjoy crowded places, but would rather be among a small group of friends talking quietly and laughing. I love science fiction and fantasy books and TV shows/movies, and enjoy playing games with friends.

Oh, and I love dogs!
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
